html:
12.31.24  10:48 am   Opinions on drywall?

      a common philosophical reference point

12.31.24  4:40 am   how to cope with world being bad currently. this is relative to its potential

      think more about how good it can potentially be. you certainly wish other people would think about that, (and they wish you would too, actually) so you might as well get started

12.31.24  4:04 am   why don't you acknowledge any of your contributions to the field of chemistry in your website, mr. wurtz? 

      i haven't made any contributions to chemistry. i apologize for not making this more clear, and also for not contributing

12.31.24  2:48 am   when am i gonna finish programming the proof of concept im working on

      i'm not sure

12.31.24  2:29 am   do you agree with the idea behind "I think, therefore I am"?

      i don't actually know what the idea is behind that. that quote is so blindingly famous, it seems to drown out its meaning

12.31.24  2:11 am   can you give me the most interesting prompt you have im runnin outta fic ideas. ty from a struggling writer 

      this is sometimes considered the 'easy way out', but just write everything

12.31.24  1:49 am   How do you view the relationship between intent and self expression?

      it's possible to express yourself without intending to, and it's possible to not do it despite intending to

12.31.24  12:08 am   Do you think that the more we develop our individual identity, the more we alienate ourselves from other people?

      it's your choice whether to do both of those at the same time

12.31.24  12:06 am   qwweerrttyyùiooppppaaaassddfffgghhhjjjkkllllzzzzzzzzzxxcccccvvvvvvvvvvvvbbbbbbbbnnnnnnmmmmmm

don't you feel the same?

      sort of

12.30.24  10:31 pm   Is there anything in particular you want out of 2025?

      how about 9x5x9x5

12.30.24  10:16 pm   how do you live each day knowing one day the sun will explode and cause the heat death of the universe?

      how did they live when they thought the sun was a football in a sports game between zeus and his other sports pals

12.30.24  9:19 pm   "addicted to workahol" reminds me of this billboard near where i live that says "breakthrough addiction", (instead of "break through addiction"). and i've been wondering ever since if i might be addicted to breakthroughs and is this causing a problem for me, and thinking about the breakthrough withdrawal symptoms i have experienced lately..... and many times throughout my life.

      yeah i have that

12.30.24  8:46 pm   do you have more song ideas or videos ideas? well now i wanna know how do you sort your ideas? do you have specifics like here are the "song ideas" then "video ideas" then "other ideas" or what

      it's not unheard of for them to switch lists during development

12.30.24  6:39 pm   What if we called all Stop signs Pots signs instead?

      could work

12.30.24  6:38 pm   hi bill i'm home for the holidays and since this is time off for me i kind of expecting to have a productive songwriting period. actually it has been really difficult because i have almost no privacy. the walls are thin and people are always home. so i'm wondering how do you write songs when you are afraid people are listening?

      you can surely develop a notation system to write down what you are going to play, at a later date

12.30.24  6:04 pm   if your own view of reality feels so absolute - how do you come to understand the reality of other people? What would be a good first step you think?

      first, live life for 1 moment. then step 2 would be live life for one additional moment. and so on

12.30.24  3:52 pm   what's your favorite time signature

      regular

12.30.24  3:41 pm   why do "jazz" and "chairs" sound so similar?

      if your dialect is non-rhotic

12.30.24  2:55 pm   Do you have an affinity for cars, beyond their function of bringing you from point A to point B? Like, if you were a billionaire (maybe you are, I don't know), would you want to have a lot of fancy lamborghinis or rolls-royces or cadillacs or whatever? 

      i wouldn't collect cars. but that doesn't mean i dislike them

12.30.24  2:13 pm   Do you like 365 being the number of days in a year

      that extra 5(.25) has gotta be saying something about earth's relationship to whatever else other than the sun

12.30.24  1:30 pm   thoughts on everything?

      could work

12.30.24  10:01 am   why would poetry be considered evil

      maybe by another poem

12.30.24  8:58 am   Are you learning any languages right now?

      sort of

12.30.24  8:49 am   Of all the instruments you know how to play, which one was the most difficult to learn for you?

      learning continues on steadily, at the same rate, for all things, over a long period of time

12.30.24  8:19 am   what is your favourite U.S. State or Canadian province

      'no mans land'

12.30.24  8:00 am   Motaigne stated that reading books is bad since it prevents you from forming a world view that is completely yours, even unconsciously. Do you think the same applies for music, even though it is more about feelings ? -oh wait, I fell for the same thing that I'm complaining about !-

      no need to stress about how much input you get or don't get. any amount will work just fine, and you will probably end up oscillating between less and more

12.30.24  7:42 am   struggling to play in time, any tips?

      sometimes time gets stronger if you feel it a little more in the longer term. if you have more deep enjoyment of the surrounding 16, 32, or even more bars, even lyrically, the more you are feeling a broader number of bars in their full context, the steadier your time in the short term will automatically be

12.30.24  5:26 am   what's your opinion on reconstructive linguistics?

      could almost work maybe

12.30.24  4:34 am   Who framed Roger Rabbit?

      maybe it was the other, not-cartoon guy

12.30.24  3:27 am   i'm gonna make a recording each day. but i'm not sure if i'm ready to call them songs

      that's ok. the question is what would it excite you most to call them

12.30.24  2:42 am   do you think music theory is a kind of language to explain/understand some sort of truth inherent to the universe, like math is often described to be

      music itself does that. music theory just represents our previous incomplete attempts to pin down whatever our most recent favorite moments were at any given time

12.30.24  1:24 am   In your opinion how does lyric clarity affect a song? Is there ever a point when lyrics start to become unnecessary? How do you decide how much (or little) vocal narrative is needed to get the message across? 

      all you can do is judge that for yourself. other people can explain how they feel, but that will have no effect on what works for you. And, to take it a step further, if you're trying to reach other people, you'll never be able to do it unless you're doing what works for you. otherwise your transmitter will literally not be working

12.29.24  11:35 pm   have you ever tripped on mushrooms? if so how was it?

      it's not always clear whether the 'mushroom trip' is in fact away from or toward the mushroom

12.29.24  10:57 pm   should i learn how to draw?

      sure

12.29.24  9:59 pm   any plans for new years?

      the years have all been planned since long ago, by...... gregory maybe

12.29.24  9:13 pm   do you like cats more than i do

      i'm not sure. cats do not factor significantly into my life, but i am not against them

12.29.24  9:13 pm   is the distribution of good and bad things in the universe 50/50?

      it's evenly balanced, but it is always possible to prove it is not

12.29.24  8:02 pm   do you find it easier to play in time with a click, or with existing instrument tracks? once you have some instruments in place, do you prefer to turn the click off at that point?

      of course that depends how tight the instruments are

12.29.24  6:54 pm   when recording parts for a song, do you prefer to go "vertically" i.e first tracking every instrument for the A section, then moving on to the next section or "horizontally" where you record all sections for one instrument and then do another instrument. i just made up these 2 terms i hope you get what i mean

      neither of these ways really works

12.29.24  5:51 pm   do you think we would see the name "Jeff" differently if it were in the Bible

      jeff is in some of the unedited versions

12.29.24  5:01 pm   if you had to name the genre of music that you make, what would you name it?

      normal

12.29.24  4:07 pm   Is there any part of the video-making process that you dislike? That you wish you didn't have to do?

      sometimes i wish i didn't think i had to do what i don't have to do

12.29.24  3:22 pm   is it possible to write stories with only onomatopoeias?

      sure

12.29.24  3:12 pm   Are there any new songs in your new project that are majorily in 5/4?

      no

12.29.24  2:01 pm   why do you spell it "connexion" 

      i don't recall ever doing that

12.29.24  1:23 pm   what, if anything, have you learned from classical music?

      it's music

12.29.24  10:54 am   what is a coincidence?

      spanish and greek sound the same

12.29.24  9:23 am   favourite synth sound

      the first one

12.29.24  3:36 am   how often do you use the word supercalifragilisticexpialidocious

      it's the only word i use
